N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 85.10 - Community relations

State Regulations
(a) The
facility shall integrate its services to other relevant community services in
order to provide comprehensive care. (b) The facility shall assure through
agreements with other community resources the availability of necessary
services not provided at the facility. In determining necessity, the facility
shall take account of clinical laboratory services, special medical diagnostic
or treatment services, respite services, and foster homes or community
residences. (c) The facility shall
participate appropriately in local, areawide, regional and State planning
related to programs for the mentally disabled. (d) Significant changes in the facility
program shall take into account studies of needs and resources in the
geographic area served by the facility. Notes
